summary: A cult deprogrammer must help a couple whose daughter has recently joined a cult.
cast: Leland Orser|Mary Elizabeth Winstead|Chris Ellis|Jon Gries|Lance Reddick|Beth Grant|Cruz Flores|Suzan Averitt|Cindy Buck|David Chandler|Leonard Earl Howze|Davey Johnson|Kellie Matteson|Amanda Saunders|Nicholas Tucci|Shira Weitz|David Zellner
title: Faults
